feed.title: N3sh47
feed.subtitle: You were boasting on and on about your elite hacker skills in the bar and a few Bounty Hunters decided they'd take you up on claims! Prove your status is more than just a few glasses at the bar. I sense bell peppers & beef in your future!

entry.title: Eternal Blue - TryHackMe
entry.summary:
Introduction
EternalBlue is a computer exploit developed by the U.S. National Security Agency. It was leaked by the Shadow Brokers hacker group on April 14, 2017, one month after Microsoft released patches for the vulnerability. On May 12, 2017, the worldwide WannaCry ransomware used this exploit to attack unpatched computers.
In this article I am going to show you how to exploit a very pop...

entry.title: Mr Robot CTF - TryHackMe
entry.summary:
This is a Mr Robot themed CTF originally taken from Vulnhub.Here We Bruteforce Wordpress login pannel to find a valid user and Bruteforce again to find a valid password.Once we are in, we upload a php shell on Wordpress Theme to get a reverse shell and privilege escalate using Suid and Nmap.
Elliot (movie star)
Recon Nmap $ nmap -p- -sV -vv -Pn 10.10.189.156 Host discovery disabled (-Pn). A...

entry.title: Basic Pentesting - TryHackMe
entry.summary:
In these set of tasks you’ll learn the following: brute forcing, hash cracking, service enumeration and Linux Enumeration. The main goal here is to learn as much as possible.
Room Description Recon Nmap Let’s start by gathering as information as possible. I always love using Nmap to scan our target.
Nmap Scan
Port 80 seems promising, Let’s start with it. Port 80 Port 80 is the port number a...

entry.title: Pickle Rick - TryHackMe
entry.summary:
This Rick and Morty themed challenge requires you to exploit a webserver to find 3 ingredients that will help Rick make his potion to transform himself back into a human from a pickle.
Room Description
Recon Nmap First I started off by conducting an Nmap scan on the target.
$ nmap -sV -p- -vv -oN nmap 10.10.43.157 $ nmap -sV -p- -vv -oN nmap 10.10.43.157 Initiating Connect Scan at 21:51 Sc...

entry.title: Bounty Hacker - TryHackMe
entry.summary:
You talked a big game about being the most elite hacker in the solar system. Prove it and claim your right to the status of Elite Bounty Hacker! Bounty Hacker is a room in TryHackMe. In this article you will learn how to exploit the sudo misconfiguration when there is a password reusable vulnerability in the target machine.
Room Description
